body: This author know how to do it. The art, the expression, reactions. The taboones. Shota having his way with a big motherly woman.
need an english version of it 🤤
could have been good without that awkward artstyle ... why actual nice One piece dojins are so few ?
Poor Robin... The evil of her giant breast curse keeps attracking immoral mans , who are lusting for her body. The only way to stop that malicious curse is to translate the doujinshi.
